attributes.action: Scrap the flawed tri-partite system for economic management.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current arrangements involving a 3 way separation of macro economic management between the treasury, FSA and Bank of England has proven to be a catastrophy for the economic health of the country.  Fiscal and monetary policy cannot be dealt with independently to maintain economic stability, the current system is therefore fundamentally flawed.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
